subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Idle threats from a coward

 My only advice, use it from the same location, at least for a couple days=
. There seesm to be something they cannect to it. My version of the nMini b=
ox wasn't working well froa a couple days, then al the suddenn started work=
ing. the radio was scanning, and the electronics was working, just the "voi=
ces" were weak. 
 
 but...what do I know?
 
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.comFrom: orbhunterx@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 05:19:20 +0000Subjec=
t: [EVP-ITC] Re: Idle threats from a coward




Well, I've gone ahead and d=
one it...I purchased one of Ron's MiniBox's!!No snowball will be safe in he=
ll now!Tell you what, instead of asking Chris about life and death or heave=
n and hell, I plan to:1)Take a training class provided freely by ASUP.2)Eng=
age in a little direct inquiry and testing of spirits.3)Strongly encourage =
fearless people to find their own answers, by doing something likewise. Tha=
nks,Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "babiarz3" <babiarz3@...> wrote:>>=
 Lance, > I think you make my point very well. You say you don't know Chris=
> personally but that it seems I am the one wearing rose colored> glasses. =
I do know Chris. Even when Frank is upset he says "Chris is a> nice guy". C=
hris' statements and beliefs have never changed while> others can be wishy =
washy depending on the day. The view that Chris> does not want any one to r=
esearch the box besides him is BS. The fact> is that prior to Franks origin=
al yahoo group disappearing, Chris> provided a link directly to the schemat=
ics. In his presentations he> would tell people that the schematics were av=
ailable online. Yet,> because he is against mass production, it MUST be bec=
ause he wants the> research all to himself. Rose colored glasses or a case =
of only seeing> what is wanted? This is a fact compared to perceptions and =
opinions. > > Fact: Almost each and every user of a box or it's facsimile h=
ave> stated that lower energy/evil/dark... entities have spoken via the> de=
vice. > > Fact: Rick Moran states that the groups for testing will include>=
 believers, skeptics, senior citizens, (now here's where it gets scary)> CH=
ILDREN and HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS!> > - Couple the last two facts together an=
d do the math. One mentally> unstable child or youth hears the box tell him=
 it is right to kill or> rape or .....> > Fact: Rick Moran in his article a=
bout Tools being only as good as the> users states, "...know how they work =
before you go into the field." > So, in one place we are still testing, in =
another we are sending them> out in the field to be tested by groups that i=
nclude children and high> school students. The good thing is that a nice li=
ttle online tutorial> is available with some warnings. Phew! As long as thi=
s can't come back> on anyone I guess all the bases are covered (tongue in c=
heek). > > Fact: Chris has been the primary tester of the device in the fie=
ld.> That fact deserves consideration, at the very least. > > Fact: Last ni=
ght, a radio personality on Spooky South Coast claimed> that after he engag=
ed the dark voices coming through the box, he was> physically attacked.> > =
Fact: Frank has stated that in the beginning Chris was the only one> who un=
derstood how the box should be used.> > Fact: Some people who have received=
 boxes from Frank discovered they> were not able to use them although they =
worked fine for Frank. These> same people would not return the boxes to be =
looked at.> > Fact: After death communications have been received via both =
computers> and phones. If it were simply the devices and not the users woul=
d we> not have millions of these communications?> > Fact: Mark Macy states =
that in an after death communication> communication with Konstanin Raudive =
in which Mark asks " Can you tell> me about the equipment you use to produc=
e a perfect, almost perfect> voice on earth?" Konstanin replies "Well it de=
pends on your reception-> or mainly your psychic reception." This fact back=
s up the theory that> effective users are limited.> > Fact: In another afte=
r death communication Konstanin addresses contact> fields saying "...but if=
 there is dissonance in the form of fears,> doubts, and animosities the con=
tact field becomes cloudy...that's when> negative spirit groups close to ea=
rth in vibration can break into> existing bridges with troubling results.">=
 > > And so yes, maybe I wear rose colored glasses. However, I am inclined>=
 to believe that I have done my research and have availed myself of> quite =
a bit of information regarding this topic. > > With that said, I am holding=
 an online event where people can ask> Chris the questions they want as lon=
g as they are formed in an> intelligent manner. If you are interested in at=
tending the event you> can find the information on the front page of my sit=
e at> www.thepsinetwork.com I felt it unnecessary to attempt to "bridge the=
> gap" as well between speculation, insinuation and fact. > > Sincerely,> B=
abs> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Lance Oliver" <orbhunterx@> wrote=
:> >> > Hey Bab,> > > > Even though I've newly begun to chime in here, it s=
eems to me that > > some people are guilty of wearing rose colored glasses,=
 as far as > > Chris is concerned. LOL! I don't know him personally, so I r=
eally > > don't know what really motivates him. Right or wrong, by conducti=
ng > > himself in the manner he has, it's understandable why his approach >=
 > has drawn the scrutiny from his peers. > > > > Frankly, this entire effo=
rt is a great learning experience and > > potential healing for mankind! I =
encourage all of us researcher types > > to simply sit back, and take a dee=
p breath or three. Consider > > together why we're doing this. Let's work o=
n making this world a > > better place while we have breath...> > > > Succe=
ss!> > Lance> > > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "babiarz3" <babiarz3@> =
wrote:> > >> > > Bruce- Wow! That is a very bold statement, minus the name =
of the> > > person you are accusing (although it's clear who you are referr=
ing > > to). > > > I did read your apology for the negativity you've helped=
 spread > > about> > > Christopher Moon. I acknowledge that your apology to=
ok a great deal > > of> > > humility. However, knee jerk reactions are exac=
tly what I've been> > > talking about. People doing or saying without thoug=
ht and > > consideration. > > > > > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhal=
i333"> > > <paranormalinvestigating@> wrote:> > > >> > > > I think someone =
that stands to loose there bread and butter is > > making > > > > idle thre=
ats or having someone else do it. I would like to state > > for > > > > the=
 record. SEND ME SOME DEATH THREATS YOU COWARD OR BETTER YET > > LETS > > >=
 > SET UP A MEETING AND WE WILL SEE WHO IS LEFT FACE DOWN. > > > > > > > > =
Who ever you are you better hope I never find out, it's a bitch > > when > =
> > > the hunter becomes the hunted!> > > > > > > > If you got the balls co=
ntact me!> > > > > > > > Sum don't worry anyone that talks about doing some=
thing does only > > that > > > > TALK!> > > > > > > > Bruce> > > >> > >> >>=
